channel.title: Setting envraiment tables?
channel.description:
don't really know how to spell it, im sorry. But to the topic, im confused. i setted up environment tables but it still says ''java is not recognised'' and ''cannot find the path''. please help , what did i do wrong? please answer, these are my tables :
[URL=http://img10.imageshack.us/my.php?image=naamloosgq4.png][IMG]http://img10.imageshack.us/img10/2788/naamloosgq4.th.png[/img][/URL] [url=http://imageshack.us][img=http://img10.imageshack.us/img10/2788/naamloosgq4.png][/url] thanks

item.title: Setting envraiment tables?
item.dc:creator: @_ranqe .:ranqe:.
item.description:
@_ranqe wrote:

[quote=“The Reaper X, post:2, topic:261131”]If you think you set your variables correctly, you need to edit your compiler instead. Right click your compiler.bat and select edit. Change the version of jdk in there to the one you’ve downloaded and it should work.

If you’re not sure if you’ve set them correctly, you should check The Soul’s tutorial on “How to Start a Private Server” in the Tutorial Section.[/quote]

wow, thats it! totaly forgot the compiler! thank you so much

Read full topic

item.title: Setting envraiment tables?
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

If you think you set your variables correctly, you need to edit your compiler instead. Right click your compiler.bat and select edit. Change the version of jdk in there to the one you’ve downloaded and it should work.

If you’re not sure if you’ve set them correctly, you should check The Soul’s tutorial on “How to Start a Private Server” in the Tutorial Section.

Read full topic
